author: Sam-Harper
body:
Dear All, 

This is the backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23677 which fixes the bug in that the smeared ecal energy error was being used in the E/p combination.

This additionally adds code so the old behaviour can be produced. The old behaviour is happens for Fall17 re-miniAOD but not 2016 legacy.
title: Fixing ECAL-Trk energy combination such that it gets the uncorrected ecal energy err: 94XMAOD
